quote: If you only do what you can do, you will never be more than who you are.
author: Master Shifu

quote: Today is a gift, that's why it's called the present.
author: Master Oogway

quote: May the force be with you.
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

quote: The hardest choices require the strongest wills.
author: Thanos

quote: Our very strength incites challenge. Challenge incites conflict. And conflict… breeds catastrophe.
author: Vision

quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
author: Dumbledore
movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

quote: Oh yes, the past can hurt. But you can either run from it, or learn from it.
author: Rafiki

quote: With great power comes great responsibility.
author: Uncle Ben

quote: Do, or do not. There is no “try”.
author: Yoda
